name: Application to existing relationships
text:
Except as otherwise provided in section 526-13, an interest in or power over property existing on July 1, 2000 as to which the time for delivering or filing a disclaimer under law superseded by this chapter has not expired may be disclaimed after July 1, 2000. [L 2000, c 43, pt of §1]
 
Revision Note
 
  "July 1, 2000" substituted for "the effective date of this chapter".
